reviewText: ...with a twist.  I can only hope there is a season II.  Ian Hart keeps epanding as an actor.

An interesting experiment.
Great subject, great acting, great sound.
Too short however, and too short presence of my beloved Zara.
Awaiting more...

The DVD also contains beautiful interviews with Ian Hart, Stephen Lord and Elaine Cassidy (a delight for the fans of her.)

[...]
